text.b: Columbia University Medical Center, Ophthalmology New York, USA

page.text: Billing and coding: translated 2,600 ICD-10 diagnostic codes (encounter form and surgical form) for seven divisions;
Revenue management: conduct fee schedule adjustments; analyze reimbursement rejection report;

Project evaluation: conducted evaluation of the internal call center; wrote proposal of outsourcing strategy.

text.b: Kangtai Health Network Co., Ltd. New York, USA

page.text: Conducted market analysis of medical tourism; served as liaison between Chinese patients and U.S-based hospitals;
Assisted in identifying emerging markets; wrote reports on rare disease and orphan drugs;
Conducted research on comparative treatment and medications of cancer disease.

text.b: Municipal Centers for Diseases Control and Prevention (C.D.C.) Hunan, China

page.text: Marketed health-education lectures and conducted community outreach on smoking cessation and wellbeing program;
Collected and analyzed influenza data in 5 hospitals; performed daily influenza surveillance;
Wrote reports on disease outbreaks, mortality rates, and public health emergencies.

text.b: AIESEC – AIDS Prevention and Well-being Promotion Dar es Salaam, Tanzania

page.text: Taught AIDS prevention classes in Mbeizi high schools, and well-being promotion classes at Thabita College;
Advocated care for orphans through a campaign of selling hand-made postcards; raised $5,000 for local orphanages.
Analyzed Medicaid reimbursement rejection trends from various payers for Ophthalmology department.
Translated and re-designed 14 forms with a total number of 2,600 diagnostic codes for the whole department;
Worked with physician assistants on implementing the new ICD-10 forms and obtained feedbacks.

page.text: Created a database (size of 3,400) of population aged over 40; key program of Ministry of Health P.R.C.
